subject: Partnership Portugal & Brazil
description_text:
Hello!
First, I would like to introduce myself. My name is Rafael, I'm from Portugal, and I am a YouTuber for 14 years and Videomaker/Photographer for 8 years. I am reaching out to propose a partnership, as I would love to showcase your amazing products to my audience in Portugal and Brazil.
As a YouTuber and professional Videomaker, I specialize in reviewing tech-related products on my YouTube channel and Tiktok.
I have completed a professional course in filmmaking, which has equipped me with extensive knowledge of the movie industry. This experience has also allowed me to venture into advertising, which could be beneficial for promoting your business.
If you would like more details on how I manage my marketing strategies, please feel free to ask.
Do you accept my proposal?

P.S. If you'd like more information and links to examples of my work, I'd be happy to provide them.

Please let me know your thoughts. I look forward to your response.
Best regards,


[photo]

Rafael Marques
Content Creator & Videomaker

conversations.body_text: Hi Rafael Marques,  Could you share your YouTube account with us so we can take a look? Also, which sim racing hardware brands are you currently collaborating with, and how is the feedback or performance so far?

Hi!

Thank you for your response.

At the moment, I have the Logitech G27 and I'd love to create a review of your amazing products to help my audience learn more about them.

My tiktok videos partnerships: https://www.tiktok.com/@rafaelliontech/video/7480637477787602198
https://www.tiktok.com/@rafaelliontech/video/7494746181524819233

If you need more informations, just contact me.


Best regards,





[photo]

Rafael Marques
Content Creator & Videomaker

________________________________
De: service@simsonn.com
Hi Rafael Marques,  May I ask how you charge for your services?

Hi!

No, not at all. The only charge is for the product itself, which I will review in the video. That’s how I handle my partnerships.


Best regards,


[photo]

Rafael Marques
Content Creator & Videomaker


________________________________
